name: Ninja Craft Free - Slash The Flying Blocks To Find Gems In this Fun Game For Kids And Adults
name_original: Ninja Craft Free - Slash The Flying Blocks To Find Gems In this Fun Game For Kids And Adults
description:
Ninja Craft is an addicting action packed slashing style game. Slash the flying blocks as you try and get high score. Some of the blocks have gems in them for bonus points. Try and slash as many blocks as possible without hitting a flying TNT.

+ Leaderboard
+ Slash Flying Blocks
+ Gems Give You Bonus Points
+ Action Packed And Fun For Everyone
